ygData.subject: Re: Spell Sentinel
ygData.msgSnippet: Alliance improves your faction with a targeted npc... its used if you are trying to trade with an npc but he doesnt like you.  I have tried it with npc s I
ygData.messageBody:
Alliance improves your faction with a targeted npc... its used if you are
trying to trade with an npc but he doesnt like you. I have tried it with
npc's I trade with and it doesnt seem to improve prices but if you're
trying to buy something far from home it may be beneficial.

At 08:43 PM 5/9/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Bit Net" <dante@...>
>
>Ok, how about alliance?..I thought this added an NPC Faction to a fight but
>I must be mistaken...I tried it but the NPC I cast it on just sat there..
>
>Thanks of the Info..
>
>Jim
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: WeinisFROG@... <WeinisFROG@...>
>>From: WeinisFROG@...
>>
>><< Does anyone know exactly what this spell does? >>
>>
>>you are supposed to use it before you go to med
>>it tells you ever NPC and PC that walks into your area
>>that way it gives a chance to get up and run away
